Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame

Class ExpertGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame.ExpertGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
BannedIsland, BanTile, IncrementMaxMovement, InfluenceCluster, PseudoMotherNature, PutThreeStudentsInTheBag, StudentsBufferCluster, SwapStudents, TakeProfessorEqualStudents, RefillInterface, RoundObserver, Serializable
public class ExpertGame extends Game implements Serializable, PseudoMotherNature, IncrementMaxMovement, InfluenceCluster, StudentsBufferCluster, SwapStudents, BannedIsland, PutThreeStudentsInTheBag, TakeProfessorEqualStudents, BanTile
This subclass of game is instantiated when selecting Expert Mode, it adds the coin and expert cards system
Author:
Lorenzo Corrado
See Also:

    • getCoinBank

      public int getCoinBank()
      Overrides:
      getCoinBank in class Game

    • entranceToHall

      public void entranceToHall(Color colorStudentToBeMoved)
      This method is invoked by the current player to move a single student from its entrance to its hall. When the move is made, if the player does not have the professor of the specified color and has the most students of that color among all the players, then he gets the professor. If a player gains some coins, they will be removed from the coins reserve as long as it has them. If the coin reserve does not contain enough coins, the player should discard them.
      Overrides:
      entranceToHall in class Game
      Parameters:
      colorStudentToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when a player does not have a student of the specified color in his board's entrance
      IllegalStateException - when the hall of a board cannot accept a student of the specified color

    • playEffect

      public void playEffect(int indexCard)
      This method is called by the controller to activate the effect of a card, identified by an index. it also sets cardHasBeenPlayed to true
      Overrides:
      playEffect in class Game
      Parameters:
      indexCard - Represent a character card of the effect to activate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the effect of a card involving a non-existent student is activated
      IllegalArgumentException - If a card corresponding to the provided index does not exist
      IllegalCallerException - If the player who wants to activate a card does not have enough coins to do so

    • playVoidEffects

      public void playVoidEffects(ExpertCard card)
      Overrides:
      playVoidEffects in class Game

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      This method is used every time a player ends his turn. When the turn is an action, it sets the maximum number of island mother nature can travel and sets cardHasBeenPlayed to false. After this method, motherMovement() can be invoked
      Overrides:
      nextTurn in class Game

    • fromManCardToIsland

      public void fromManCardToIsland(int idxChosenIsland, Color colorStudentToBeMoved)
      This method is used to move a student from the man's expert card of the student cluster to an existing island. The student is removed inside the student cluster class
      Specified by:
      fromManCardToIsland in interface StudentsBufferCluster
      Parameters:
      idxChosenIsland - index of the island to which the student will be moved
      colorStudentToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - when it is passed an index which does not have a corresponding island tile in the archipelago arrayList

    • fromClownCardToEntrance

      public void fromClownCardToEntrance(Color colorStudentOnCard, Color colorStudentInEntrance)
      This method is used to swap a student from the clown's expert card of the student cluster, with a student in the board's hall of the current player.
      Specified by:
      fromClownCardToEntrance in interface StudentsBufferCluster
      Parameters:
      colorStudentOnCard - color of the student on the card
      colorStudentInEntrance - color of the student in the hall
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when there is no student of the specified color to move from the entrance

    • fromWomanCardToHall

      public boolean fromWomanCardToHall(Color colorStudentToBeMoved)
      This method is used to move a student from the woman's expert card of the student cluster to the hall of the current player. The student is removed inside the student cluster class. If the hall cannot contain the student of the specified color, the hall remains unchanged and the student is not removed from the top of the card.
      Specified by:
      fromWomanCardToHall in interface StudentsBufferCluster
      Parameters:
      colorStudentToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved
      Returns:
      true if movement has done, false otherwise

    • swapStudents

      public void swapStudents(Color entranceStudentColor, Color hallStudentColor)
      This method swaps a student from the entrance to the hall and vice versa.
      Specified by:
      swapStudents in interface SwapStudents
      Parameters:
      entranceStudentColor - is the color of the student in the entrance that need to be swapped
      hallStudentColor - is the color of the student in the hall that need to be swapped.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the selected color student isn't in the entrance or in the hall

    • putThreeStudentsInTheBag

      public void putThreeStudentsInTheBag(Color studentColor)
      This method represent the card that allows the players to put three students of the specified color from the hall of their board to the bag. If the players doesn't have enough student of the color in the hall they have to put all the students they have in the hall in the bag.
      Specified by:
      putThreeStudentsInTheBag in interface PutThreeStudentsInTheBag
      Parameters:
      studentColor - is the color chosen by the player that play this effect card
